meanings.definition: The decay or erosion of bone or teeth.
meanings.sent1: Regular brushing helps prevent caries in teeth.
meanings.sent2: Dentists can treat caries by filling cavities.
meanings.sent3: The tooth fairy must be upset about all the caries she finds!
meanings.sent4: Neglecting dental care can lead to caries spreading like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The image of caries eating away at teeth is quite alarming.

meanings.definition: A progressive destruction of hard tissue, such as bone or teeth.
meanings.sent1: Proper nutrition is essential to avoid caries in bones.
meanings.sent2: The dentist recommended a filling to stop the caries from worsening.
meanings.sent3: The caries in the old building made it look like a haunted house.
meanings.sent4: The caries in the foundation of the house threatened its stability.
meanings.sent5: The caries slowly eating away at the bone was a concerning sight.
